page.title: 06FARMING AT WYKEHAM
page.content: The Wykeham Estate is owned & farmed by Manby Estates who have extensive acreages elsewhere in the County.850 acres are farmed by a resident Fore_ man, Shepherd, Stockman & 2 skilled Tractor Drivers. Foreman Ron Coney is proud possessor of the Royal Agricul_ _tural Society Gold Medal for over 40 years' service. 732 acres currently arable, being Winter Wheat 210, Barley 150, Winter Oats (Cattle feed) 30, Spring Barley 150, Oil Seed Rape 70, Peas 30, & Root Crops (Turnips, Swedes Kale) 25 acres. 120 acres are rested in rotation for 2 years and used for grazing. Peas are sown and harvested by staff through local Farmers'Trading Group. There are about 50 acres of Woodland _ Sycamore, Ash, Beech and Spruce with ongoing programme of clearing. thinning & replanting. 0
